title: GCCI hosts strategic meeting with APMIA Chairman to boost marble exports
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 12 (APP): The Gujranwala Chamber of Commerce and Industry (GCCI) recently hosted a strategic meeting with Muhammad Bilal Khan, Chairman of the All Pakistan Marble Industry Association (APMIA), to discuss ways to enhance the export of marble products and contribute to Pakistan’s foreign exchange earnings.
The meeting aimed to share valuable insights and expertise with GCCI members, highlighting the immense potential of Pakistan’s marble industry.
Chairman APMIA emphasized the need for collaborative efforts to enhance the industry’s global competitiveness.
On the occasion, Atif Farooqi, Diplomatic Liaison Advisor to APMIA, noted the potential for growth and collaboration in the marble industry, expressing enthusiasm for working with the GCCI to boost export capabilities.
Similarly, Rana M. Siddique, President of the GCCI, expressed satisfaction with the meeting’s outcome and reaffirmed the GCCI’s commitment to supporting local industries.
The meeting underscored the GCCI’s efforts to promote industrial growth and economic development in the region.
